title: How Three Words Made My Day
author: themirrazz

language.reason: One use of s--t, except censored as 'sh*t'.

purchases.reason: Mentions of a Tesla car. Talks about the Reddit and Discord social media platforms, and mentions Discord features that can be activated, specifically Discord Nitro and AutoMod. Contains links to a subreddit and a Discord server. Mentions of iTunes, iOS, and Apple.
